overview: Valerie Brown is an award-winning marketing executive with 12 years of digital experience primarily focused on developing digital marketing and social media strategies for leading media brands such as The Bravo Network and Time Out New York. This includes the development and execution of innovative first-to-market partnerships with brands such as Foursquare, Twitter and Spotify. She has appeared as a speaker and panelist at numerous industry events hosted by CTAM, 360i, IAB, and OMMA. As Senior Director of Marketing at Remark Media, Brown leads multi-platform marketing efforts including social media, partnerships and CRM. Previously, Brown served as Director of Digital Marketing at Time Out North America where she oversaw marketing and communications for the launch of Time Out New Yorkâ€™s first e-commerce focused website, iPad and Android applications.
